definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 te4 se4 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Restaurant light box production must have characteristics, to attract customers.
sentences.chinese: 餐廳燈箱製作肯定要具有特色，要做到吸引顧客。

sentences.english: Democratic supervision is a form of supervision with Chinese characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 民主監督是具有中國特色的一種監督形式。

sentences.english: This part try to find the Tornatore's habits of direction and personal characteristics from the video shoot.
sentences.chinese: 從短片中找尋託納託雷的拍攝習慣和個人導演特色。

sentences.english: Every single one has a character of its own.
sentences.chinese: 每塊林地都有自己的特色。
第二道特色菜15個才僅僅8元人民幣。

sentences.english: Learn the materials to make a hand mirror at home in this free crafting video.
sentences.chinese: 學習材料，使在家在這個自由各具特色的視頻手鏡。

sentences.english: A dual-executive is the central characteristic of semi-presidential systems.
sentences.chinese: 行政體系二元化是半總統制重要的特色之一。

sentences.english: The another big characteristic that small family bedroom places furniture is to fore-and-aft development.
sentences.chinese: 小戶型居室放置傢俱的另一大特色就是向縱向發展。

sentences.english: Emancipating the mind and run through the infiltration of socialism with Chinese characteristics in all levels.
sentences.chinese: 解放思想貫穿於滲透於中國特色社會主義的各個層面。

sentences.english: The CEAC features custom-made arbitration rules for China-related trade.
sentences.chinese: 這家機構的特色在於它的仲裁規定。

sentences.english: The newly-opened store inherits South Beauty's constant features of fashion and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 新店沿襲了俏江南時尚創新的經營特色。

sentences.english: Their characteristic is that they can isolate layers selectively.
sentences.chinese: 使用雙封隔器選擇性封隔地層是這兩種儀器的特色。

sentences.english: Here are some of the most prominent characteristics of the Nokia 5530.
sentences.chinese: 下面是一些比較突出的特色表示，移動設備。

sentences.english: The special merchandise brought by these peddlers, coming in throngs from other areas, enliven the local market.
sentences.chinese: 這些客幫帶來的特色商品活躍了本地市場。

sentences.english: The system of theory of interpret of French-Chinese each other that exploration builds Chinese characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 探索建立中國特色的法漢互譯理論體系。

sentences.english: Compared with Nan dynasties, the works of Sao Style have its own characteristic, though its quantity is not too large.
sentences.chinese: 北朝騷體之作數量不多，但與南朝相比自有其特色。

definition: having a unique or distinctive style
lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
harmonious combination of Chinese and Western elements (idiom)
mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
